predictions.text: U.S. Core CPI (All items less food and energy, MoM, SA) for November 2025 will print between +0.1% and +0.3% in the BLS release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm in BLS CPI news release for November 2025: the month-over-month percent change for 'All items less food and energy' is within [0.1%, 0.3%].
monitoring_signals: High-frequency price data (gasoline, rents, used cars)
PPI core trends and import prices
NFIB price plans and ISM prices paid indices
predictions.rationale: Core disinflation trend remains near 0.2% MoM; no clear shock to push far outside 0.1–0.3%.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10Y–2Y Treasury yield spread (FRED: T10Y2Y) will close at or above 0.00 percentage points on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: A daily FRED observation for T10Y2Y with value >= 0.00 occurs on or before 2025-12-31 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: Moves in 2Y yield relative to 10Y (policy path repricing)
Inflation/PCE prints and labor data revisions
Term premium estimates (ACM term premium)
predictions.rationale: Late-cycle steepening is plausible as cuts get priced; reaching zero is challenging but feasible.

predictions.text: ICE Brent front-month crude will settle at or below $78.00 per barrel on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: An official ICE settlement price for the Brent front-month contract is <= $78.00 on any UTC trading day through 2025-12-31.
monitoring_signals: OPEC+ quota headlines and compliance
Global growth indicators (PMIs, trade)
Inventory builds in EIA/IEA monthly data
predictions.rationale: Macro uncertainty and inventory dynamics create downside tails despite periodic geopolitical risk premia.

predictions.text: At least five FAA-licensed U.S. commercial orbital launches will occur between 2025-12-21 00:00 UTC and 2025-12-31 23:59 UTC.
predictions.verification_criteria: Count launches with FAA commercial launch licenses in the specified UTC window via FAA AST records or authoritative launch logs (e.g., NextSpaceflight) showing liftoff within the window.
monitoring_signals: SpaceX, Rocket Lab, ULA, Relativity published launch manifests
Range availability/weather at CCSFS/Vandenberg
FAA launch license issuances/modifications
predictions.rationale: Year-end cadence often bunches; still weather and range constraints make five in 11 days challenging.

predictions.text: In CDC NREVSS, national RSV test positivity will reach at or above 10.0% in at least one weekly report released by 2025-12-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: CDC NREVSS RSV National Trends dashboard shows national percent positive >= 10.0% in any weekly data point published by 2025-12-31.
monitoring_signals: Regional RSV positivity in NREVSS (South/West lead)
Pediatric hospitalization trends (HHS Protect)
Syndromic ILI/ARI signals rising in FluView
predictions.rationale: Seasonal RSV typically peaks in late fall/winter; current respiratory activity is building across regions.

predictions.text: University of Michigan Index of Consumer Sentiment (preliminary) for December 2025 will print between 95.0 and 104.0.
predictions.verification_criteria: The preliminary December 2025 headline ICS value published by the University of Michigan falls within [95.0, 104.0].
monitoring_signals: Gasoline prices and stock performance of megacaps
Labor market headlines and layoffs trackers
Conference Board Consumer Confidence as a cross-check
predictions.rationale: Sentiment has stabilized with disinflation and strong equities; shutdown-related data noise tempers upside.

predictions.text: CME FedWatch Tool implied probability of a 25 bp rate cut at the January 2026 FOMC meeting will close at or above 40% on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: On any trading day by 2025-12-31, the FedWatch daily close shows probability ≥ 40% for a -25 bp move at the Jan 2026 FOMC.
monitoring_signals: Core PCE/CPI prints and labor data revisions
FOMC communications and dot-plot signaling
Front-end Treasury yield moves (2Y, ED/SR futures)
predictions.rationale: Markets often test early-cut narratives as inflation cools; odds can spike on soft data.

predictions.text: Cboe VVIX Index will close at or below 85.0 on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Cboe VVIX official close value ≤ 85.0 on any trading day through 2025-12-31 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: SPX realized volatility and term structure
Earnings season catalysts fading into holidays
Cross-asset vol (MOVE, FX) co-movements
predictions.rationale: Risk-on tone post-megacap earnings and seasonal vol compression support lower tail in VVIX.

predictions.text: ERCOT hourly wind generation will reach at least 34,500 MW on at least one hour by 2025-12-31 (CST).
predictions.verification_criteria: ERCOT public dashboards or hourly operational data show Wind Gen ≥ 34,500 MW for any single hour by 2025-12-31 (Central Time).
monitoring_signals: Cold fronts and high-wind events in Texas
Wind fleet availability and curtailments
Real-time ERCOT wind output trends
predictions.rationale: Seasonal wind patterns and capacity additions make a new hourly peak plausible.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-31, OFAC will announce at least one Houthi/Ansarallah-related sanctions designation via an official U.S. Treasury press release.
predictions.verification_criteria: A U.S. Treasury press release adds at least one person/entity linked to Houthi/Ansarallah to the SDN List or sanctions under a relevant program.
monitoring_signals: CENTCOM-announced Red Sea/Gulf of Aden incidents
Houthi attacks on shipping and U.S. assets
U.N. and coalition diplomatic actions
predictions.rationale: Persistent maritime threats typically trigger periodic U.S. designations to disrupt financing and procurement networks.
